mapper.select: SELECT u.name AS userName, u.id AS userId, u.email, pg.leader, pg.position, pg.role, pg.progress, pg.status FROM projectgroup AS pg JOIN user AS u ON pg.userId = u.id WHERE pg.projectId = #{projectId} AND NOT pg.status = "x";
SELECT * FROM projectgroup WHERE projectId=#{projectId} AND userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT into projectgroup( projectId, userId, status) VALUES (#{projectId},#{userId},#{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE projectgroup SET status=#{status} WHERE userId=#{userId} AND projectId=#{projectId}
UPDATE projectgroup SET status="0" WHERE status=#{status}
UPDATE projectgroup SET status="x" WHERE projectId=#{projectId} AND userId=#{userId}
